name: SafeHouse Private Storage Volume
summary: Learn about .SDSK files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: SDSK files can only be opened by entering the correct password. Once a SafeHouse volume has been opened, the files and folders saved in the volume can be accessed by the user. Files can be added or removed from the volume as long as it is open.
SafeHouse can create an unlimited number of encrypted volumes, though each SDSK file has a maximum file size of 2TB.
NOTE: The SDSK extension is used by SafeHouse 2.0 and later. SafeHouse 1.x saved encrypted volumes with a .DSK extension.

description: Virtual disk created by SafeHouse, a file privacy program; stores files and folders in an encrypted format that is password protected.
